title: Protect Position
description: Invest to grow at the maximum rate possible while defending core advantages.

title: Invest to Build
description: Challenge for leadership by reinforcing strong advantages and funding expansion.

title: Build Selectively
description: Specialize around limited strengths and exit areas lacking momentum.

title: Build Selectively
description: Concentrate investment in segments with clear upside while monitoring risk.

title: Manage for Earnings
description: Protect existing programs, optimize profitability, and reinforce promising bets.

title: Expand or Harvest
description: Expand into adjacencies without high risk; otherwise streamline and harvest.

title: Protect Position and Refocus
description: Manage for current earnings, defend moats, and refocus on resilient segments.

title: Manage for Earnings
description: Optimize cash flows, upgrade core offerings, and minimize additional investment.

title: Divest
description: Exit segments where upside is limited and reallocate capital toward growth.
